description.original: Use multiple cursors even more powerfully.
description.translation: 更加强大的多光标使用功能。

dict.Notice(\"You must be focused on a markdo: Notice("您必须聚焦在一个 Markdown 文件上。")
dict.Notice(\"Both 'name' and 'query' must ha: Notice("'名称'和'查询'都必须有值。")
dict.Notice(`A query with named \"${name}\" a: Notice(`名为"${name}" 的查询已存在。`)
dict.Notice(`Something went wrong when deleti: Notice(`删除该查询时出错。请检查控制台中的错误信息。)
dict.Notice(`No instance of '${toSelect}' fou: Notice(`在笔记中未找到 '${toSelect}' 的任何实例（未被选中）。
dict.name: \"Move to next instance of current: name: "移动到当前选择的下一个实例"
dict.name: \"Move to previous instance of cur: name: "移动到当前选择的上一个实例"
dict.name: \"Add next instance of current sel: name: "将当前选择的下一个实例添加到选择中"
dict.name: \"Add previous instance of current: name: "将当前选择的上一个实例添加到选择中"
dict.name: \"Add a cursor on the line above\": name: "在上方行添加一个光标"
dict.name: \"Add a cursor on the line below\": name: "在下方行添加一个光标"
dict.name: \"Insert an incrementing value at: name: "在每个光标位置插入递增值"
dict.text: `Waiting for content from: '${sour: text: `正在等待来自 '${source}' 的内容`
dict..setName(\"Open Saved Query View on Load: .setName("加载时打开已保存查询视图")
dict..setDesc(\"If off, disables all notifica: .setDesc("关闭时，禁用所有非因错误或更改设置而产生的通知。")
